title: Graph NDJSON Stream Frames (Union)
description: Each NDJSON line MUST be one of the canonical Graph streaming frames (data/end/error). Wire-stable across v1.x.
$comment: Transport rules (enforced by stream validator, not JSON Schema): exactly one terminal frame (end OR error), and no data after terminal. Frame size SHOULD be â‰¤ 1 MiB; servers MAY emit heartbeats as empty/metadata-only data frames.
